All Implemented Interfaces:
Combinator, Component, EventLabels, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, SchedulerAware, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating
class TestComponent
extends Rename
implements EventLabels

The main logic of the demo component. Note the renaming, which ultimately hooks up our button to the peer's checkbox.
